This site has been created entirely with open-source software, using [Quarto](https://quarto.org/), R and is hosted on [Netlify](https://www.netlify.com/). If you want to use this website as a template to build your own, you can find the source code on [my Github page](https://github.com/pkollenda/website).

Photographs are mostly my own or from [Unsplash](https://unsplash.com/) photographers, subject to the [Unsplash license](https://unsplash.com/license). Avatar created with the [avataaars generator](https://getavataaars.com/), designed by [Pablo Stanley](https://twitter.com/pablostanley).
